channel.title: koth on Ethan Ho
channel.description: Recent content in koth on Ethan Ho

item.title: Hack a Bit 0x1 - King of the Hill
item.description: Different box this time, your target is now 10.128.0.4–straight to root. Remember that there may be non-vulnerable services on the machine. Recon is the #1 focus. Once you have access to the fourth machine in the range you need to listen on port tcp/5000, you can do this with nc, for example. The flag will be sent at a specific time. Retain control of the box to get all the flags.
